tool_description: Access the official Latvian Government Company Register via this API. Ideal for KYB purposes
name: Latvia Company Data
title: Latvia Company Data

api_list.name: GetAddressfromCompanyLinkedID
api_list.description: Get the address of a Latvian comany from the linked ID returned in a previous search

api_list.name: SearchpersonbyownerId
api_list.description: Once an owner id has been returned from a previous search, this API endpoint can be used to search for person details.

api_list.name: SerchcompanyownerIDbycompanyname
api_list.description: Get the owner Identifier(s) of a company by its name, using % as a wild card search

api_list.name: SearchbycompanyId
api_list.description: Search for a company by it's Latvian company ID. This will return a linked ID that can be used for further queries.

api_list.name: SearchbyCompanyName
api_list.description: Search the Latvian business register by name, using the % symbol as a wildcard
